Package org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.reports.designer.validators

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReportValidator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReportColumnValidator
    Validates that column ids are valid in report
    ReportHierarchyValidator
    Validates that hierarchy ids are valid in report
    ReportMeasurelessHierarchiesAmountColumnsValidator
    Validates that measureless hierarchies that can be used without amount and MTEF columns
    ReportMeasurelessHierarchiesValidator
    Validates that the report doesn't contain measureless hierarchies and amount/MTEF columns
    ReportMeasureValidator
    Validates that measure ids are valid in report
    ReportNameValidator
    Validates that report name is not blank
    ReportNonSummaryColumnsHierarchiesValidator
    Validates that all columns can be hierarchies in summary reports only
    ReportSummaryValidator
    Validates that summary reports should contain at least one hierarchy or measure
    ReportTabMaxMeasuresSizeValidator
    Validates that number of measures in a TAB doesn't exceed the limit of MAX_SIZE_MEASURES
    ReportTypeValidator
    Validates that report type is valid
    ReportUniqueNameValidator
    Validates that report name is unique across AMP.
